about: Suggest a new feature or improvement for Aquarium Guard
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## What Feature Would You Like to See?
A clear description of the feature or improvement (e.g., "Add a reminder for water change schedules").

## Why Is This Feature Useful?
Explain how this feature would benefit users (e.g., "Helps users track maintenance tasks and keep their aquariums healthy").

## Possible Implementation
If you have ideas, describe how the feature might work (e.g., "A calendar tab where users can set recurring reminders with notifications").

## Additional Context
Add any other details, examples, or screenshots related to the feature.
